title: The water in Mississippi's capital is safe to drink, city officials say
description: Officials in Mississippi's capital city say water flowing from city faucets is safe to drink

title: WATCH:  Miniature cow and duck 'besties' take a dip together
description: Milkshake the duck and Dumplin the miniature cow are a “sweet love story,” according to photographer and animal lover Bre Boyette.

title: House Republicans are poised to censure Adam Schiff
description: Republicans and Democrats clashed on the House floor as members delivered impassioned remarks on a resolution to censure Rep. Adam Schiff.

title: Pilot arrested after allegedly being over alcohol limit, police say
description: Lawrence Russell Jr., 62, was charged after his arrest on Friday at Edinburgh Airport, a Police Scotland spokesperson told ABC News.

title: Jan. 6 rioter who used stun gun on officer sentenced to more than 12 years
description: A man who tased a police officer in the neck during one of the most violent clashes of the Jan. 6 riots was sentenced to more than 12 years in prison Wednesday.

title: Plane that flew over DC crashed almost straight down at high speed, report says
description: An unresponsive business jet that flew over the nation’s capital had plunged into a Virginia mountain at a high velocity before it burst into flames

title: Sorority says rules allow transgender woman at Wyoming chapter
description: A sorority being sued because its University of Wyoming chapter admitted a transgender woman seeks to dismiss the lawsuit, saying sorority rules allow the woman's membership and a court can't interfere with that

title: FTC sues Amazon for allegedly tricking millions of users into Prime subscriptions
description: Amazon avoided fixes that would hurt its bottom line, agency claims.

title: Man accused of killing neighbors after teen reportedly exposed himself to man's kids
description: A newly released police document alleges an Idaho father ‘executed’ a neighboring family because he was upset that the neighbor’s 18-year-old son had reportedly exposed himself to the man’s children

title: Hunter Biden case assigned to Trump-appointed judge
description: Hunter Biden's federal case has been assigned to a judge who was appointed by President Donald Trump, but in the past has supported both Republicans and Democrats.

title: McCarthy discourages GOP conference from backing Biden impeachment resolution
description: Speaker Kevin McCarthy is discouraging the GOP conference from backing a Biden impeachment resolution, saying it could threaten his slim majority.

title: Explosion in Paris injures at least 16; police trying to determine cause
description: Police say a strong explosion has hit a building in Paris’ Left Bank, leaving at least 16 people injured

title: Schumer unveils new AI framework as Congress wades into regulatory space
description: Majority Leader Chuck Schumer unveils new AI framework as Congress eyes entering the regulatory space around the emergent technology.

title: Army soldier ID'd as suspect in campground shooting of 5 people, 2 fatally
description: A member of the U.S. Army has been identified as the suspected gunman who shot five people, two fatally, at a campground near a music festival in Washington.

title: Bryan Kohberger's DNA matches evidence found at Idaho murder scene: Court docs
description: DNA collected from Bryan Kohberger is a match for evidence found at the Moscow, Idaho, crime scene where four University of Idaho students were murdered.

title: Federal Reserve 'very far' from inflation goal, Fed Chair Jerome Powell says
description: The Federal Reserve remains "very far" from its target inflation rate and most members of its decision-making committee support at least one additional rate hike.

title: Aaron Rodgers is set to speak at a psychedelics conference
description: The NFL star has been open about his use of ayahuasca in the past.

title: Biden administration moves to restore endangered species protections dropped by Trump
description: The U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service plans to reinstate a decades-old regulation.

title: Andrew Tate appears in court as defendant following rape, human trafficking charges
description: Andrew Tate made his first court appearance as a defendant on Wednesday after being charged with rape, human trafficking and creating an organized crime group.

title: Campus assault suspect on run for 2 years, after 'So I raped you' Facebook message
description: It's been two years since officials in Pennsylvania armed with a startling Facebook message that said, “So I raped you,” filed charges in a 2013 sexual assault at Gettysburg College

title: Threats against Norway's LGBTQ+ Pride festival rise following deadly 2022 attack
description: Norway's domestic security agency says there has been an increase in threats against next week's LGBTQ+ Pride festival in Oslo following a deadly shooting last year at the annual event

title: WATCH:  Rembrandt museum offers visitors souvenir tattoos
description: Visitors to Amsterdam's Rembrandt House Museum are being offered a memento beyond the usual gift shop fare.

title: European Union countries agree on a new package of sanctions against Russia
description: European Union countries agree on a new package of sanctions against Russia

title: Israeli settlers torch Palestinian homes, cars to avenge deadly shooting
description: Hundreds of Israeli settlers have stormed into a Palestinian town in the occupied West Bank, setting fire to dozens of cars and homes to avenge the deaths of four Israelis killed by Palestinian gunmen the previous day

title: Member of 'Central Park Five' running for office
description: Some consider Yusef Salaam a folk hero as a member of the “Central Park Five,” the group of teenagers wrongly convicted of raping a white jogger in a brutal attack 34 years ago

title: WATCH:  Toddler dressed as Flounder from 'The Little Mermaid' meets Ariel at Disneyland
description: This cutie is no guppy!

title: Russia says it downed 3 drones outside Moscow, suspects it was attack by Ukraine
description: Russian authorities say two drones have crashed outside Moscow.

title: Alleged classified documents leaker Jack Teixeira to be arraigned
description: Jack Teixeira, the member of the Massachusetts Air National Guard accused of leaking classified documents online, is set to be arraigned in federal court on Wednesday.

title: China says Biden comments likening leader Xi to a dictator 'extremely absurd and irresponsible'
description: China has called comments by President Joe Biden referring to Chinese leader Xi Jinping as a dictator “extremely absurd and irresponsible.”

title: Gang behind slaughter of 41 women at Honduran prison, officials say
description: Women at a prison in Honduras had complained for weeks that gang members were threatening them

title: Whistleblower alleges firing for raising concerns over missing Titanic sub: Suit
description: A former OceanGate employee contends he was fired for raising concerns.

title: Modi to start US visit with yoga on the UN lawn
description: There will be plenty of time to discuss global tensions during Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s visit to the U.S. this week

title: WATCH:  Dad scales waterslide to help his stuck daughter
description: A British dad stepped up to scale a waterslide to help his daughter, who was stuck.

title: College program provides a sustainable move-out option
description: A program at Barnard College has collected over 20,000 pounds of discarded dorm items. such as pillows and microwaves, and taken them away from landfills.

title: Judge strikes down gender-affirming care ban in Arkansas
description: An Arkansas judge has struck down a gender-affirming care ban in the state.
